Content: "Brickhead" Bruno's tag was exactly as ordered, and came much sooner than I expected.  I'm totally happy with my order - and with the luminous rubber ring around it, it doesn't drive any of us crazy with all the jingle-y noise from his old tags.

* Terrific Quality…* Fair Pricing…* Super People to work with…* Great Service…I had a very special request & they were wonderful and understanding.  I received the tags I needed quickly and they are PERFECT.Thank You….
5 stars‼️  The tag I ordered is of good quality, cute and looks great on Buckley’s collar. I look forward to ordering more tags. Thanks
A beautiful, colorful selection of art that will match you or your pet. Easy to customize with pertinent info. Easy shopping experience. Fast delivery. What's not to love?
A quality product at a fair price. Quick turnaround and delivery as well. A company that cares about the pets that they support.   Thank You
Absolutely adorable. Everything imaginable. Sturdy & very well made long lasting tags. My fashion girl owns many!!! Ship fast!

Absolutely love our new tags! So far the quality is great.  We haven't quite put them to the test with our typical outdoor adventures that have destroyed other tags, but I'm fairly confident they will pass with flying colors. The added glow in the dark ring around them has been wonderful. Love that I can update both my pups information in the same place/account as well for that "just in case" situation.My only negative experience (and reason for 4 stars) was with any kind of customer service.  After receiving the purchase confirmation email, I never received another one.  I kept trying to check my order online through my account but it never showed any updates or tracking number and I emailed twice inquiring the status and never received any kind of response.  It just showed up in my mailbox one day, which I'm grateful for, but it would have been nice to have some kind of update and/or response to emails.All in all super stoked about our new tags!
Adorable choices, accurate personalization, fast shipping. What more could you ask for!

After not receiving my order via USPS, I reached out to customer service and they were wonderful! I got a new set of tags shipped out to me immediately and they arrived within a couple of days. The tags look great, with bright colours and clear writing. I would buy from them again in a heartbeat! I loved all the designs but went with a superhero design!
all perfect all time
Always a great buy. This is my 6th tag and It won't be my last.
Always fast shipping, unique tags that last forever.
Always friendly. Always has helpful products to keep my animals happy and healthy.

ALWAYS great customer service and products. I got one of their tags free at an event years ago and have been using them ever since. The quality has gone UP in the past few years with the newer tags being virtually indestructible from what I can tell. Highly recommend to everyone.
Amazing I love it I am very happy with my tag my cat loves it for sure
art is awesome.  turnaround is incredibly quick. quality is dynamite and i love that they are local!
As always, very happy with your products, timely shipments, and excellent customer service.
Awesome customer service as always!  Thank you for your help and a great product.
Awesome just what I was looking for it arrived on time
Awesome product. Looks great on my American Bully.  Bought four his 4th birthday as a gift. The print is very bold. Very satisfied
beautiful tag, shipped quickly. Looks great on my little munchkin
Beautiful tag.  I love it!  Looks great on my sheltie!
Beautiful tag. Quick turn-around. Great choices. Highly recommended.
Best customer service I’ve had in a while. What a great company!
Best quality tags I have ever purchased.  Looks great on my dogs.
Best tags around and best customer service!!
Between the wonderful customer service team and the high quality of their products, I cannot say enough good things about this company.  I certainly will continue to be a repeat customer.
Communication issues, but happily resolved.  Thank you.
Couldn't be better
Customer series is amazing! Errors are correctly swiftly and at no cost.
Dog Tag Art had a retired tag that was no longer available from from Lupine, where we purchased the matching collar and tag years ago.  It was wonderful to find it again.

Dog Tag Art has a wonderful selection of tags available to choose from.  The tags are high quality and made to last.  The artwork and engraving are perfect.  They have a fast turnaround time once the order is placed.  I love the glow in the dark band that fits around the tag that’s provided with the order.  I’m very happy with my purchase and I wouldn’t order a pet tag from anyone else.

Dog Tag Art has the greatest pet id tags! The colors of the tags don't rub off nor does the writing. I'm on my 3rd tag. I ordered the cute as a cupcake one for my dog a few years ago, then got the same one again with updated address when I moved. I also just purchased a cute and funny tag for my kitty. As if Dog Tag Art isn't the greatest already, they often have coupons for tags on Groupon!!
Dog Tag Art has the very best dog tags! They are witty, creative and unique!   Quality is excellent, too!  I have been a customer for several years, through two dogs!  So many choices!

Dog Tag Art is a fabulous company! I've purchased several tags, and love all of them! They look so nice on my two dogs. I highly recommend Dog Tag Art. They're the only company that makes dog tags that I can always count on to turn out perfectly and with so many great designs!

Dog Tag Art is an exceptional company that produces high-quality, custom dog tags for our furry friends. I am absolutely thrilled with the product and service that they provide.First and foremost, the quality of the dog tags is outstanding. They are made from durable materials that are built to last, and the printing is clear and vibrant. The tags are also available in a variety of shapes, sizes, and designs, so you can find the perfect tag to suit your dog's personality.What sets Dog Tag Art apart from other companies, however, is their commitment to customer service. From the moment you place your order, the team at Dog Tag Art is friendly, professional, and incredibly helpful. They go above and beyond to ensure that you are completely satisfied with your purchase, and they are always available to answer any questions or concerns that you may have.Overall, I would highly recommend Dog Tag Art to anyone in need of a custom dog tag. Their quality products and exceptional customer service make them a top-notch company in the pet industry. Thank you, Dog Tag Art, for making such a fantastic product!
Dog Tag Art is the best company with fantastic customer service and tags.
Dog tag was exactly as ordered. Personalized printing is clear and easy to read. Tag itself is sturdy and looks like it will last a long time.  I recommend this product.

DogTag Art is great!  I can find tags for my dogs and cats.  They have tags to fit your pet's personality, for special occasions and they even have tags representing favorite bands!  You can also upload your own art.  These tags are solid.  I have been buying from DogTag Art for 3 years now, the first tag I bought is still shiny and whole.  The artwork/information on the tag has not faded at all!  Will definitely continue to be a long-time customer.
Easy website interface for making the custom dog tag, quick shipping, looks great!
Excellent app
Excellent customer service!! They resolved my problem with my dog tag immediately, Dog Tag Art is awesome!

Excellent customer service, because I had a very specific order for and expectation of longevity. Because my last service dogs' tag lasted so long. I received a beautiful tag.. I'm hoping it will last many years, I can't wait to find out. YML
Excellent customer service.  My puppy promptly is an aggressive chewer and managed to destroy his tag in the first month and they replaced it at no charge
Excellent quality dog tags! These are the best! I have purchased several for both my cats and dogs and have never been disappointed.

Excellent quality tags, with clear images and lightweight material. When our first tag was never delivered, they were quick to respond and send us a second tag free of charge. Our cat looks beautiful in her new tag!

Excellent staff that was very helpful and so polite.  Our “Maggie” looks so cute with her new tag!  Very well made & we will be ordering more in the future!  Keep up the good work & wonderful customer service!
Excellent Tags with fun designs!  Quality made; they stand behind their product!
Excellent workmanship and timely service. Love the various options for tags and the special features offered. Perfect solution for a working cow dog!

Fantastic customer service! Designed a symbol that was just what I wanted. Exceptional quality & fast turn around from ordering to delivery. Would have rated 5+ had tag not had white coating. Wanted metal with no coating over tag.
Fantastic tag. when ever i need a dog tag i come to Dog Tag Art. LOVE THEM
Fast delivery, quality products, excellent customer support, satisfied customers.
Fast service, great product!
Fast, accurate dog tags!  They stand behind their product!  I had an issue with another tag over 2 yrs. old and they replaced it free of charge!  GREAT customer service!

Fine experience again that time; received both items quickly. Only disappointing order was earlier this year, when a tag attachment piece began to shrivel and broke within months. That’s never happened before; those have always been great. Tried one more in a different color but now don’t need it anymore, so won’t know until it can be used in the future sometime. Only then would I be able to tell whether those particular ones would still be worth buying (I’d hope so as I love their color coordination factor, even if they’re overpriced.) General review of company would be: World's finest selection of artistic, top-quality tags, unquestioned--allowing every pet to sport perfectly personalized neck-bling for style and safety. Have fun looking through the troves of designs to find precisely the proper one, then finish off with the just-right choice of attachment (plus a protective rubber silencer if you so choose.) Always a good time and comes printed beautifully on both sides. Available in large for medium/large dogs and small for small dogs & cats.
From start to finish the ordering process was very easy. Received items before expected and they were exactly as ordered. Will purchase from Dog Tag Art again
Front AKC CGC design looks great, but the backside name and number part of the tag smudged soon after putting it on my dog's collar. Overall pleased with size of tag and front design.
Fun tag to show people our dog passed the AKC K9 Good Citizen training. Website was easy enough to navigate and tag came at a reasonable price and shipping time. Thanks!

Gosh I had a very specific request, not anything like a typical dog tag verbiage and bam!! No hesitation and the tag was sent out like the next day.  I even emailed customer service to be sure they understood my request and the rep was on it!!!!!  You can't go wrong with these guys 💓 I forgot to add that the tag is gorgeous, very well done!!
Got a custom dog ID tag for my pup. It turned out perfect! I love it.
Got my tags and was really impressed.  They were easy to put together , the tag protector ring glows in the dark and my dogs love them
Got our tag in a timely manner and everything was correct on it.
Great comminication with customer service, fast shipping, very easy to personalize and create your tag. I'm 100% satisfied with my tag.  Thank you

Great customer service and a great dog tag that will last a lifetime. We had one of our tags that was nearly non- legible and they replaced it no problem. Would buy and recommend Dog Tag Art to anyone.
Great price for a unique dog tag. Turn around time was fast, and shipping was fast as well. Thanks
Great product and a great customer service  my boy has had his tag sence 2015

Great product and service.  Amazing choice and the team are responsive and always willing to help - even if you are in a different country (we are in the UK).  Our dog loves her tag!We’ve made a number of purchases over the years and will continue to do so..
Great product I couldn't find anywhere else (a Charlie Brown dog's nametag) and not only was it exactly what I had hoped it would be, but also arrived promptly. Very happy with my purchase....
Great product, great price.  Very happy with it. I will use them again in the future.
Great product, great service, fast and easy to use! Thanks for sending out our Canine Good Citizen dog tags - Sunshine and Rocket are proudly wearing them around the neighborhood!

Great product. Having to get a new tag for our dog I opted for a nasa one. It came and I was really impressed, not only with the logo but with how the details of our dogs name and other information was printed on the back. Can honestly say I will use again.
Great product. Well made.
Great products and even better service
Great quality tags.  I’ve ordered many from this company and they never disappoint. Love Dog Tag Art
Great quality, speedy service and reasonable price. Love the guarantee.
Great quality.  Easily read and nice designs.  Very pleased!
Great service
Great service, quick delivery, fun creating custom tags. Love supporting small business too!
Great tag / super colors and quality
Great Tag!  Fast service!
Great tags, great service, fast shipping!
Great to work with and love new tags.
Great website and very easy to navigate and make purchase.
happy, happy, everybody happy!
HIgh quality tags, cute designs. Large enough to read the dog's info.
High quality tag, turned out just how I imagined the tag I wanted for my cat
High quality, fast service.

Holly and the entire team.  Understanding my special shipping requirements and responding quickly and professionally to my concerns.  Can’t forget the extra TLC thaybeent along with my order.  Annabel sends huge doggy kisses!!!

I absolutely love Leo’s new St Joseph dog tag and the glow in the dark protector that I also ordered. Leo is a Yorkie and the tag is perfect because it is lightweight and doesn’t bother his neck!! Would definitely order again!! Shipping was also quick!!
I always dress my fur babies with the best so that is why i choose you!Always happy with the awesome tags with the best quality engraving. Highly recommended!
I always order my dog tags from here. They are cute, well made and arrive quickly.
I am a repeat customer. Always delighted with my purchases.

I am happy with the finished product, however, I didn’t appreciate the fact there was no way to track the order. I reached out via email, but never heard back. Someone did call me and said that they did respond to my email - I just never received it.

I am super impressed with my photo tag! The quality is superb and shipped so fast!  I highly recommend dogtagart. I have two so far. I will do business again! Thanks for your wonderful talents!  Renee from Alabama

I bought them for the unique/fun designs, but am extremely impressed with the quality and durability. My dog is a fun loving outdoor wild child and these are holding up despite his ‘best efforts’ to mark them up or destroy them in the daily. Customer service was A++ as well, resolved my minor problem via emails within just a few hours. Would recommit anyone:)
I can always find a tag to go with any collar that I purchase.  Excellent quality and fast service!  The last tag I purchased was "Lean Green Irish Machine" to go with his St. Patricks Day collar.

I can't even count how many tags I have from Dog Tag Art.  I like changing them and we get many compliments from the beautiful work of art on the tags.  This is the ONLY place I get our dog tags from!

I couldn't locate a 'gift card' on the website, so I reached out to their customer service and received a prompt response with a direct link to purchase the gift card. I have used their gift cards in the past for my own dogs and really appreciated the options provided for designs and writing on the back of the tag. I wanted to spread the joy of a unique, custom dog tag, so I've bought gift cards for my sisters who have recently adopted their own dogs! Very thrilled with the ease of purchase and quick shipping.
I did not receive my tag after 2 weeks and the gentleman on the phone, issued a replacement with no problems.  He was very understanding and courteous.

I don’t give out 5 stars often but these are seriously the best tags I have ever found!  Engraved tags wear down-even the best ones on the market.  These just don’t.  I have had 5 Australian Shepherds wearing these tags day after day-with other tags on their collars.  Other than  having been chewed (they have tooth marks!) and tugged on, you can still read them!  The color nor the writing is worn or faded.   Amazing!
I gift my dog a tag for Christmas every year!  Beautiful artwork, durable, more lines to write information and thoughts!  We (my dogs and I) highly recommend Dog Tag Art!

I had a great buying experience with Dog Tag Art! I was a little concerned that my font choice and size wouldn’t match my ‘design’, but the dog tag turned out great! Without any hesitation, I would buy from Dog Tag Art again!

I had an order for one dog tag that was designated shipped over two weeks ago that I hadn’t received.  I contacted customer service twice with their form email on their website and did not receive a response to either inquiry.Edited to add: Dog Tag Art contacted me and replaced the order I did not receive.  I appreciate that.  The quality is very nice although my dog has found a way to chew on the tag.  He hasn’t made enough progress to render the tag useless, but I was a little surprised he could make teeth marks on it.

I had originally tried to order for delivery to Australia but it wasn’t listed an option. I sent an email and was informed that due to issues with UPS they had suspended shipping to Aus which is fair enough. A few weeks later I received an email from Holly to inform me that they had resumed shipping to Aus - I promptly ordered and my tag has arrived today precisely as per my customisation. Great customer service and product.

I had previously bought two tags for my dog and the lettering was no longer legible. I made one call to customer support and was able to use the warranty to replace the tags with the new upgrades. The agent was courteous and very helpful.  Great job!
I have 4 dogs and they all have a tag from dog tag art. The tags are durable, clear, and adorable! There are so many design options… I highly recommend dog tag art if you are looking for a pet tag!

I have been ordering tags from Dog Tag Art for at least 15 years. The tags are always good quality and they have a great selection of styles to chose from. I ordered one for my 15 year old cat when he was a kitten and it is still, after 15 years, in excellent condition.If your cat / dog is a chewer, make sure the tag is close enough to their collar so they can't get to it to chew on it. That is in no way a criticism of the tag itself.
I have bought multiple tags from Dog Tag Art throughout the years because they are high quality, easy to read and last for a long time. Well worth the money.

I have bought my dog tags from this place for 12 years. I have three dogs and they have always been great . When my little chihuahua had to have both eyes removed I made a personal tag and now it is on there list to buy.
I have bought quite a few tags and tag holders over the years and they are great.  Quick shipments.

I have bought tags from dog tag art for over 7 years . I noticed lupine pet used them to match the microbatch designs & I always order those to match the new collars. I have 4 dogs so lots of tags. I got this recent one bc my sweet Labrador started having seizures . I was able to not only get a medical tag , but add his dosage & medicine etc!( I wish I could order a tiny waterproof pill holder to attach to his collar -since this co is so good w medical alert tags maybe they can make a similar lightweight dosage holder ?) These are perfect  tags ,- even the rubber things that go around the tags to quiet them are superior! Most are junky - these actually FIT and work as designed ! Very happy w my recent order!

I have bought these dog tags for a few years now. My last order arrived late and I assumed it was lost, I was promptly given a replacement order. Excellent  customer service! The tag styles are fun and a ton of variety to choose from. I have a few for each of my dogs.
I have had a dog tag that I purchased 8 years ago and is still in perfect condition. These tags are legible, durable, they don’t fade and I love all the designs.
I have had excellent service from this company. The 5 tags I have purchased are beautiful and accurately printed.

I have now made 3 purchases from Dog Tag Art. The first two purchases were made over 4-yrs ago and the tags are still in great condition, as well as the rubber gasket that prevents the clanging noise. I just purchased my third for our newest furbaby and it is just as great as the others.Ordering was simple, email confirmation and status updates were sent, product was received timely.

I have ordered 6 pet tags from this company and they are the best quality tags that will last your pet's lifetime. They have cute designs and something unique for each of my pets' personalities. My pets have hilarious names and I am pretty sure the staff is always cracking up when they do up my tags. I know for sure on the last one they did because they hand wrote it on the receipt. "Potatoe Potato" is my hairless cat's name and they even had a "cute potatoe design" so it could not have been more symbiotic.

I have ordered several pet tags over the past few years both for myself and as gifts. Dog Tag Art has all the right stuff. A fun and user friendly order site, lots of options, high quality production and a quick turn around after ordering. Dog Tag Art has a great vibe!
I have ordered several tags. Some Lupine designs and some pf my own. I love how well made they are and how easy it is to put together your own design.
I have ordered the st Francis dog tags for my dogs from Dog tag art for the last 10 years.  Great quality, fast shipping.  More variety than any pet store.

I have ordered these tags for years. I even buy the rubber ring to go around the tags. After a couple of months the lettering starts to wear and peel away. I have two dogs right now that need new tags because you can’t read their info anymore. And your prices went up to almost 20 dollars for a tag??!!! I have bought them as low as 10-12 dollars at Petsmart and petco. Just ordered some new ones for the rescues here one last time to see if they last. Won’t be buying again.

I have purchased 13 pairs of these AMAZING tags from DOG TAG ART for my two PBGVs, Ivy and Iris since May 2023! Of course they are all an EXACT match to the collars and leashes I purchased from Lupine Pet (wonderful vendor also). I purchased a pair of PBGV tags just to enjoy for myself! These tags are truly worth every penny of their price. If you visit their website, dogtagart.com, you will find all the information you need. Please purchase for your own dog(s), I PROMISE, you will not be disappointed!

I have purchased 3 dog tags from Dog Tag Art for my 3 dogs and I love, love love them!!! Great quality, super fast shipping, just an awesome Company to purchase dog tags from! And they have the best selection of any place I have seen so far.

I have purchased from Dog Tag Art for years. They are the best dog tags, created from sturdy enameled metal, great colors and distinctive designs. The printing is crisp and clear. If a tag develops a problem, the company will replace it. Great product!
I have purchased quite a few tags from Dog Tag Art. There is always a great selection of tags for my adventure dogs. Shipping is fast, even during the holidays. I’ll be back soon to buy more tags!

I have used Dog Tag Art for many, many years, and have always been impressed with their high-quality work. I changed my opinion when I received my last tags in the mail. True, they are still high quality in the toughness of the material, but I was appalled at the lack of ability to read "Do Not Separate From Handler" on my dog's service dog tag. I know this because I had the same tag on my last service dog 10 years ago and it looks better than the one I just received. I'm not sure why this company chose to alter the perfect lettering they had previously. But hopefully they will review this issue and rectify this issue. I did have photos showing the old tag and the new to help the shopper, but this review does not have the capability to post photos. I have contacted the company and they will not respond. Hope this helps everyone! UPDATE: The company did contact me after this review and I received excellent customer service, they replaced the tags and explained to me that there was a change the machines used and font styles. The lady I spoke to on the phone was professional, friendly and represented the company fabulously. I did receive the replacement tags, were they as good as the originals? Not even close-they were a bit better but not that much. I did replace them and called it good. I would order from them again, absolutely!

I have used Dog Tag Art tags 3 times now and could not be happier. Quality workmanship is outstanding and the tags can take rough dog play without damage to the ceramics. I will be using this company for as long as I have dogs.
I highly recommend Dog Tag Art. They have so many selections and have great products that are made very well. The turn around time is fast and it’s packed great for shipping. I am a repeat customer.
I just adopted a mutt and she needed an ID in case she wandered off.  The tag was so nice and the printing is very clear.  Thanks for the choices you give.
I like my tag.  I am disappointed that it did not come with the extra protection around it that the old ones did.

I love dogs &cats only that it cause so much to have them where I live I'm not able to bye one & keep there meds.& Dr. Bills & pay my rent&cable & all my others bills, but sure would love to have a pet of my own my dog die before that I move out here, all that I do is think about her all the time for I miss her so much, maybe I will get another one day with the help off the Lord I just keep on praying & hoping for the best,

I love DogTagArt!! My puppies look fantastic in their new tags and they fit their personalities perfectly!! I would highly recommend them but only if you love your pup and want them to look stylish!!  I also love the rubberized ring that comes with each tag to keep the tag from getting beat up banging against their license.
I love it! I got the canine good citizen tag for my dog when he passed his test! I love the tag and the personalization I will be getting him the trick dog one soon!

I love my dog tag! I was able to put both my name and my boyfriends and both of our numbers. It is not too big. Very clear text. And the front side is so cool with the art! His name is Goose from top gun and that’s exactly what this tag exemplifies! Bravo!
I love my dog tags ! I am glad I can customize it to what I want and pretty much have it match my dog perfectly. It is also durable and should last a really long time.
I love the penguin tag. It is so cute
I love the tag I got for my pup and the service was very quick!

I love the way the tags look! I received them really fast! I am extremely happy that they are made in the USA. I also love that the company supports keeping animals and their owners together and finding forever homes for pets who need them! ❤️
I love these tags! There are a lot of original designs, variety of letter style options, and fair prices. Glow in the dark tag covers are also available.

I love this company!  Their customer service is top notch.  I have written with several questions, and I always receive a timely response.  They unfailingly work with me to help take care of any issue I may have. Their customer service, along with their high quality products are the reasons why I will continue to purchase from them.

I love this company, and their staff! Our organization needed tags for our Certified therapy dog teams, and they delivered.I also have personally gotten them for gifts, and everyone loves them. I'm so glad we found Dog Tag Art!
I love this tag. And the glow in the dark tag protector is super. I will always buy tags from you, you offer a great variety.
I love your products.  Always a quality product and processed in lightening speed.
I loved the first tag I bought so much I’ve bought another one.
I never received my order.  I contacted customer service and no one responded.  :(

I order a personalized ID tag with a new photo of our girl Kiki every year. They do an awesome job with "printing" her photo! This year I also ordered a Lupine collar for her . It should arrive in a few days . Customer Services notified me it has shipped and we can't wait to put her latest tag on it!

I order a personalized ID tag with a new photo of our girl Kiki every year. They do an awesome job with "printing" her photo! This year I also ordered a Lupine collar for her . It should arrive in a few days . Customer Services notified me it has shipped and we can't wait to put her latest tag on it!

I ordered a tag through Lupine Collar along with a collar. The collar came but no tag. I called lupine and they said it could take up to 2 weeks to arrive. After waiting more than 2 weeks I called Dog Tag Art and was told I should have received it at least a week earlier. They didn’t hesitate to sent a new tag with tracking details. Another tag I ordered directly from them came without hyphens in the phone number. I had auto inserted it but their form left the hyphens out. I called and again they sent a new tag with the phone number corrected. Both times they were a pleasure to work with. And their tags ain’t bad either!

I ordered an AKC CGC tag for my dog. The tag and clips arrived on time and reflected the information about my dog that I requested. The information is clear and readable on the tag. I am 100% satisfied with the quality of the product and service.  If I need additional tags, I will not hesitate to order from Dog Tag Art. I highly recommend this company based on quality of product and service
I ordered my fourth custom tag through dog tag art. Placing order was simple and my tag arrived within one week. Great experience, great quality. Highly recommend!

I originally got my cat a "DTA" tag from "Lupine" . I like the fact the tags are easy to read and the designs are scratch resistant. However they are drastically heavier than aluminum so I can only have her collar on for so long.

I purchased small tags.  The color is not vivid enough to see the pictures on this size. Also, I've only had them for a few weeks and the letters/numbers are already rubbing off.  With a few minor improvements, this could be a good tag.

I purchased the Best Friends tags, I thought they are very original, adorable and sized right for my pups (Papillons) and the for my sister's Beagles!! They are getting their tags as a Christmas gift, and I am sure they will love the idea!!

I realized after printing off 18 or so that you can get the photo of your dog on the tag...this is even better for us.  I am the founder of GreenDog Foundation and we rescue a lot of older/senior dogs who live out their lives with us.  They are laid to rest, in whole, on our property and we buy a tree to plant over them for their memorial.  On the tree, we hang their dog tag...I love to see them flourishing over the rainbow and I always know where they are now :)

I received a call from a customer after not receiving my order from USPS and it was great! I immediately received a new set of labels and it arrived within days. Tags well with bright colors and clear text. I will see them again at heartbeat! I love all the designs but I go with the design superhero!

I received a name tag from a silent auction event at HSBC. Loved the variety of selections available.  It was ordered and received within 2 weeks. And it's a well made product.  Already referred 3 other pet friends to the site.  The quality is way better and about the same price as the tags you get in Petco and petsupermarket.

I received the "all-star licker" tag on time for a Christmas gift.  Simple and easy ordering and excellent communication on the progress of it making its way to my door.  Everyone loved the quality and the glow-in-the-dark silencer.

I recently had the pleasure of ordering custom dog tags from Dog Tag Art, and I couldn't be happier with my experience! From start to finish, this company exceeded my expectations in every way.First and foremost, the ordering process was a breeze. Their website is user-friendly and offers a wide variety of design options to choose from. I loved being able to customize the tags with my pet's name and contact information. Plus, they had an impressive range of designs to suit every style and personality.What really set Dog Tag Art apart, though, was their commitment to quality. The tags arrived promptly and were crafted with excellent attention to detail. The materials used felt durable and long-lasting, assuring me that my furry friend would be safe and stylish.What truly stood out was their customer service. I had a minor issue with my order, and their support team was incredibly responsive and helpful. They went above and beyond to resolve the problem promptly, leaving me with a smile on my face and a positive impression of their commitment to customer satisfaction.

I recently purchased an ID Tag for my two German Shepherds. The tag has an awesome design and is filled with vibrant colors. I really appreciated your work. The overall experience was good I recommend it for those who need an ID tag for their pet.

I wait all year for the 2 for one tag sale. These high value tags are worth it  and if my pocket book afforded every collar and harness would sport one of the fun long lasting tags.with 2 dogs of my own and a host of foster dogs during any one year tags are of critical importance .I have used this companies tags for over 10 years  the lifespan of a host of dogs. And have always been happy with  peoples response to the art and the long endurance of the data content

I'm thankful for the speedy service! I'll definitely keep buying from Dog Tag Art for my future pets and suggest DTA to anyone in need of an ID tag for their pet.

It’s always a pleasure when I order new tags for my babies! Outstanding customer service, quick shipping, everything I’ve ordered has been perfect! These tags are fairly indestructible as well, two of my cats have been wearing them for at least 12 years and they still look brand new! I’ve put them through the washing machine and they’re still perfect! Even though they’re chipped, I love the link on the back that will help get them home if they get lost, all of their pertinent info is quickly available to whoever finds them. There is usually a Groupon available, but well worth every penny at full price for the peace of mind knowing my furry babies are safe!

Years ago, I created and ordered a tag to identify my dog if lost.  It had a picture of her and me on front and on back it had my contact info. So, I went back to Dog Tag Art and found that my tag was still on file.  With the help of Holly Matthews, I was able to change the contact info to our names and Cayenne's dates and order a new tag, which I now wear around my neck.  Holly did such a wonderful job helping me.  She was courteous, kind and professional.  Their tags lasted 14 years on Cayenne and now I wear one.  I will order from them again!
